data.message: Bitch don't even understand can't get a hold of me cause I'm poor and no one is doing their jobs right to help including her who needs to help with disability services... my phones getting shut off and shit cause all these people are useless and I live in poverty there is only so much I can do by myself taking care of my son alone is hard with his autism. I have a new phone now atleast but seriously people have no regard for how excruciatingly hard my life is and others make it. I cannot just throw a disabled kid in daycare and work it doesn't work like that
